verbs.description: [ARG0: australia] [V: aims] [ARG1: to remove asylum seeker children from nauru australia] aims to remove all asylum seeker children from nauru within two months as concerns escalate about their deteriorating health after languishing on the tiny pacific atoll nation for up to five years nauru australia papua new guinea
